text: We have updated our COVID-19 factsheet with the latest info for people with epilepsy including info on the Pfizer BioNTech COVID vaccine. The updated factsheet is available to download on our website: https://t.co/617TL2kZ8i #COVID19 #TalkEpilepsy #Epilepsy #Vaccine #Coronavirus https://t.co/epQ986fvMd
